alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 6:00AM AKST until December 30 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow, blowing snow, freezing rain, and strong winds occuring. Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Power lines could be damaged and trees blown over. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches are expected. Freezing rain with less than one tenth of an inch accumulation expected this morning. West winds gusting 40 to 50 mph expected through Wednesday afternoon. * WHERE...Denali. * WHEN...Until 6 AM Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
